description: Great for the school lunch box, or easy lunch served with salad or chips.
name: Ham Rice & Vegetable Pie Maker Patties Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add grated carrot, peas, corn, spring onion, garlic, ham, both cheeses and rice, and mix thoroughly to break the rice up.
In a jug lightly whisk your eggs and add salt and pepper. Then add this to the bowl and mix. Add the flour lastly and mix till everything is well combined.
Turn the pie maker on, and add about 1/4 cup of the mixture. Close lid and cook for 8-10 minutes or until the tops are brown. I used my Kmart pie maker to make this lot.
These can be cooked in a muffin pan in the oven if you don't have a pie maker. Preheat oven to 190 degrees and cook for 25-30 minutes ( depending on your oven) or until tops are nice and brown.
